paper_title.en: On weakly unitarily invariant norm and the Aluthge transformation

description.en:
In this paper we show that |||f(PλUP1-λ)||| ≤ max {|||f(T)|||,|||U* · f(T) · U + f(0)(I-U*U)|||}, where T ∈ script B sign(script H sign), ||| · ||| is a semi-norm on script B sign(script H sign) which satisfies some conditions, T = UP (polar decomposition), 0 ≤ λ ≤ 1 and f is a polynomial. As a consequence of this fact, we will show that some semi-norms ||| · ||| including the ρ-radii (0 &lt
 ρ ≤ 2) satisfy the inequality |||f(PλUP1-λ)||| ≤ |||f(T)|||. We also give some related results. © 2003 Published by Elsevier Inc.

paper_title.en: On weakly unitarily invariant norm and the Aluthge transformation
On generalized numerical range of the Aluthge transformation

description.en: A study on generalized numerical range of the Aluthge transformation is presented. Some theorems on Aluthge transformation are discussed. It is shown that the Aluthge transformation T̃ of a matrix T and a polynomial f satisfy the inclusion relation WC(f(T̃))⊂WC(f(T)) for the generalized numerical range if C is a Hermitian matrix or a rank-one matrix.
